text: In rare cases, some people getting the #COVID19 #vaccine have reported a rash, sometimes 1 or more days afterwards. Dr. @bruce_y_lee explains the so-called #CovidArm and do’s & don’ts in @Forbes. Even if you do get this rare rash, still get your 2nd dose! https://t.co/B4hPAYQgXz https://t.co/lSyon8Z1w9
